name: Prestis Silly Workshop
detailed_description:
Prestis Silly Workshop is a App that allows streamers to interact with their fans with multiple features!

ALT+F4

This allows your viewers to stop any currently focus application!

Of course you can blacklist specific programs within the configuration of the module!

Bounce

This allows your viewers to spawn little pictures on your screen which bounce around!

Mute Mic

Did you ever feel like you viewers should be able to chose when you are muted? Well this is exactly what Mute Mic does, it mutes the OBS (and in the future discord) mic input for a set amount of time!

Keyboard Input

This allows your viewers to send ANY keyboard input and maybe be the reason you lose your next match!

Mouse Input

Similar to keyboard input your viewers can move your mouse around and click at everything!

Tamagotchi (Currently not functional)

Spawn your own little entity to take care of with your stream!

Bluescreen of Death

Let your viewers open a fake BSoD that keeps you from doing anything for a few seconds!

PTO (Prestis Take Over)

Allow me to do some shenanigans on stream!

short_description: Give your stream the ultimate power of closing your games, giving your fake Bluescreens and muting your audio input! This and a few more things are possible with Prestis silly Workshop!
reviews:
“This thing is buzzing heavy”
7 – Azura

“Quite frankly I am suprissed this even got on steam!”
10 – OnlyWiff

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2700 / Inteli Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This App contains depictions of a virtual pet you can take care of that CAN show sings of sadness.
